props.name: direction
props.description: Sets where the tooltip renders in relation to the target.

props.name: text
props.description: The text to be displayed in the tooltip

props.name: type
props.description: The type of tooltip. `label` is used for labelling the element that triggers tooltip. `description` is used for describing or adding a supplementary information to the element that triggers the tooltip.

props.name: keybindingHint
props.description: Optional keybinding hint to indicate the availability of a keyboard shortcut. Supported syntax is described in the docs for the `KeybindingHint` component.
